fields.name: projectId
fields.doc: Project identifier. Null if unknown or the user is not enrolled in a project.

fields.name: userId
fields.doc: User Identifier created during the enrolment.

fields.name: sourceId
fields.doc: Unique identifier associated with the source.

questionnaire_value.name: Questionnaire
questionnaire_value.doc: General schema for questionnaire. Check the specification folder to see how the questionnaire has been defined. For each QuestionnaireType there is a JSON file reporting the questions set and possible answers if available.

fields.name: time
fields.doc: Timestamp in UTC (s) when the questionnaire is submitted to the subject.

fields.name: timeCompleted
fields.doc: Timestamp in UTC (s) when subject marks the questionnaire as.

fields.name: version
fields.doc: It reports the questionnaire version stated in the JSON specification.

fields.name: answers
startTime
fields.doc: Timestamp in UTC (s) when the question is shown.

fields.name: endTime
fields.doc: Timestamp in UTC (s)  when the question is answered.
Answers list. The answers order must follow the questions order.
